title: 16th June 1958: Hungarian Communist politician Imre Nagy executed for his role in the Hungarian Revolution of 1956
itunes:summary: Despite being an ardent Marxist he began moves towards introducing a multiparty political system and, on 1 November 1956, announced Hungary’s withdrawal from the Warsaw Pact and its status as a neutral ...
